title: The Bible - Walking by Faith in the Armory of Truth Part 1
description:
The Armory of Truth, Parts 1-6 with Richard Rives:
Referencing his book, "Too Long in the Sun", Richard Rives shows how the bible prophecy found in 2 Corinthians 11:4 speaking of those who "preacheth another Jesus, whom we have not preached, or if ye receive another spirit, which ye have not received, or another gospel, which ye have not accepted, ye might well bear with him" is prevelant among the indoctrinated church of today.  Unfortunately the flock remains unaware as its pastors lead the sheep astray.

In these presentations, we learn of the different gospel preached in the modern church as compared to that which Jesus preached. The reason is the flock has been more likely mislead into following a paganized Christanity - Tammuz, Ezekiel 8:44, Jeremiah 44:17-25, from the Babylonian Mystery religion, Revelation 17:5.www.toolong.com , www.wyattmuseum.com , www.davidrives.com

This widespread calamity may be best summed up in Jude 1:15-19; 
     (15) "To execute judgment upon all, and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed, and of all their hard speeches which ungodly sinners have spoken against him.
